definitions.title: n.pr. 1
definitions.body: of wady between Ephr. and Manass, ´[[נַחַל ק]]: Jos 16:8, Jos 17:9 (both P), Ka(ra)na, Kanai, etc.; identif. by Rob BR iii. 135. with Wady Kânah, S. and SW. of Nablûs, cf. Buhl:Geogr. 101, 105.

definitions.title: 2. loc
definitions.body: in Asher, 19:28, Kan(q)a(n), etc.; prob. ḳâna, SE. fr. Tyre Rob BR ii 455 f. Buhl:299, Egypt, ka’nô WMM:As.u.Eur.181, and perhaps Tel Am. Ḳanû.
